title: Installation issue: Fails to build fl on skylake due to x86_64 target limit
body:
### Spack version
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.0-905-0e4d561
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack -k install fl %gcc@4.8.5
...
==> Error: InstallError: fl is built for Linux x86_64 platform only.
...
==> Error: Failed to install fl due to ChildError: InstallError: fl is built for Linux x86_64 platform only.
/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fl/package.py:24, in install:
         21            with working_dir('fl_{0}'.format(spec.version)):
         22                install_tree('.', prefix)
         23        else:
  >>  24            raise InstallError('fl is built for Linux x86_64 platform only.')
...
$ spack arch
linux-centos7-skylake_avx512
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux 3.10.0-862.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Apr 20 16:44:24 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.5.1804 (Core)
``` 

### General information

- [x] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
